'''Notes'''
Previous report can be found at https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Laptop/Natty/AsusF2J 

This is high end laptop, labeled as "Asus revolutionary notebook series". It was bought around 1998 for about 5000 zl.

Suspend still doesn't work on this laptop. Hibernate used to work, but not with this release. Card reader work only with standard cards and no HC. 

The only device that doesn't work out of the box is win modem. 

Laptop had just had HD upgraded to SSD and boot time is now 22 sec. Generally I would recommend this laptop to use with Linux (if you can live without suspend).
